text:
Stop spending hours recording videos.

Create your own AI twin instead:

Many people waste time on:

- Recording
- Editing
- Adding captions

And forget that there’s a simpler way.

Introducing the Personal Avatar from Synthesia.

Here’s how it works:

1. Record Yourself
↳ Spend just 2 minutes talking.
↳ The AI captures your voice & body language.
↳ No need for long recording sessions.

2. Generate Your Twin
↳ The AI creates a digital twin of you.
↳ Use it to make videos without recording.
↳ Perfect for quick video creation.

3. Create Videos Effortlessly
↳ Use your twin for anything.
↳ Available on your browser, directly.
↳ High-quality videos in just a few clicks.

4. Edit Automatically
↳ The AI adds captions for you.
↳ Edits your videos instantly.
↳ Saves you hours of work.

5. Personalize Your Content
↳ Make videos that feel personal.
↳ Your twin speaks just like you.
↳ Engage your audience with ease.

Stop wasting time on video production.

Let the Personal Avatar do the work for you.



PS: You can even create a video with Santa Claus giving "avatar cards" to your network. It's so funny to create, and free: synthesia.io/santa.
